nodes.text: Two Nharwaak CR90 corvettes from group Phazer took part in the Conflict at Mylok IV during the Galactic Civil War.

The Nharwaak used Phazer group's corvettes during a last ditch effort to stop the transfer of completed advanced hyperdrive technology from the neighbouring Habeen species' Frigate Lendova to the Galactic Empire.
The Lendova destroyed the heavily damaged Phazer 1 with a volleys of turbolaser fire.
